channel.title: Second Click NPC Disconnects?
channel.description:
Hey i Need A Bit of help for Project iScape, Ive been working through all the skills and i got to theiving and noticed that the second click npc was making me disconect its pointing to the packet for second click npc at this line
[code]int NPCID = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].npctype;[/code] can anybody help?
